values: How Is It Right to Justify the Ungodly?How Is It Right to Justify the Ungodly?

We unseat judges with indignation who acquit the guilty. Our moral sensibility is outraged when wrong and guilt are given legal sanction. Yet at the heart of our gospel stands the sentence: God justifies the ungodly who trust in him.We unseat judges with indignation who acquit the guilty.
